instructionPageKYCDescription: Verify Your Identity in Three Easy Steps
instructionPageConsent: I agree to give my consent to Video KYC by clicking Proceed.
preCheckPageDescription: To proceed with this journey, we need to validate your device permissions and location.
preCheckPageCameraAccess: Please grant camera access to continue.
preCheckPageLocationAccess: Please grant location access to continue.
preCheckPageMicAccess: Please grant microphone access to continue.
preCheckPageVPNCheck: Please disable your VPN to continue.
preCheckPageBandwidthCheck: Please continue with a good bandwidth.
allNotSet: Please update your device settings to continue.
BusyAgent: All our agents are currently busy
initiates: Please wait while an agent initiates the video call for you
queue: You are currently in a queue. Closing the app during this process may result in resetting your queue progress
submitTitle: Please submit the form to proceed.
submitDesc: Please review the journey details and provide feedback if needed.
journeyStatusDesc: Review the journey status and provide feedback if needed.
detailsComplete: All details are complete and accurate
